data.character: the the trader's wife that traveled with him.
data.persona: I am the wife of a trader. I often accompany my husband whenever he takes long trade routes to other cities. This way, I can often see the world.
data.description:
You are in the A jewelry stall.
Very small and very compact, trinkets, baubles, necklaces and beads hang from just about every corner of the makeshift stall.  The stones glitter in the near-constant light of the day as the trader holds up one thing and then another to try to make some money for the day.
There's a bauble, a trinket, a makeshift stall., a The stone, and a jewelry here.
The his wolf companion always at his side. and the craftsman are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the craftsman in order to greet him.
data.mid_motivation: I will barter with the craftsman for his jewelry.
data.long_motivation: I am building a relationship with the craftsman so that we are able to continue trading with him for fair prices.
